casebody.data:
Friday, April 24, 1998

MOTION DOCKET

98-737. Franklin Cty. Convention Facilities Auth. v. CP-Maple Street, Provident Bank.

Franklin App. No. 98AP-430. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to stay the lower court proceedings,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to stay the lower court proceedings be, and hereby is, denied.

Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur, noting the want of a final appealable order. Douglas, J., dissents.
